content: 99.co Event HDB BTO Investments Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 May 2019If I don't even have enough money to buy my first BTO to live in, how do I invest in another property?Looking to invest in property but dont even have money to buy my first bto, is there a way around this?1 answerAnswerBump0

Douglas Chow, Chief Enlightenment Officer at Empower AdvisoryLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 27 May 2019Hi Douglas here. Keynote 2nd speaker.BTOS are the cheapest property u can buy in Singapore. So if u can't afford it yet, save up.Alternatively u might want to invest in overseas properties but for the risks involved, I wouldn't recommend so freely.​​​
You can always connect with me via https://www.facebook.com/douglas.chow.908 or simply whatsapp/sms my company 24/7 hotline @83324283
Remember, plan your finances properly, don’t overstretch, do your homework and enjoy your property investment journey.
Regards
